name: Chocolate Banana Protein Shake
recipe: 1. In a blender, add 1 banana, 1 cup of milk, 1 tablespoon of Nutella, and 1 scoop of chocolate protein powder. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve immediately.

name: Berry Oatmeal Smoothie
recipe: 1. In a blender, combine 1/2 cup of raspberries, 1/2 cup of Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup of milk, 1/2 cup of oatmeal, and 1 tablespoon of honey. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Pour into a glass and enjoy.

name: Nutella Banana Greek Yogurt Smoothie
recipe: 1. In a blender, add 1 banana, 1/2 cup of Greek yogurt, 1 cup of milk, and 1 tablespoon of Nutella. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve and enjoy.

name: Raspberry Chocolate Protein Shake
recipe: 1. In a blender, combine 1/2 cup of raspberries, 1 scoop of chocolate protein powder, 1 cup of milk, and 1 tablespoon of honey. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Pour into a glass and enjoy.

name: Oatmeal Banana Smoothie
recipe: 1. In a blender, add 1 banana, 1/2 cup of oatmeal, 1 cup of milk, and 1 tablespoon of honey. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve immediately.
